data.name: Gangstar New York
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to the Closed Alpha
We are excited to have you join us on this adventure. We are committed to build this game together with you, our players, and we are eager to hear your feedback on this very early version of the game.

Become the Kingpin
Take over New York piece by piece. Compete for control of the Hotspot against all the other players. Stand proud over your competitors, your friends and your gang as a giant holo-statue. At least until the next challenger comes along.

Change the Game for Everyone
Conquer the Hotspot and watch it change to announce your ownership. Take control of the sandbox events. You decide what the other players play. Your city, your rules.

Stunning Social Sandbox
Compete, collaborate and cause chaos in a near-future New York City, from the lowest gutter to the highest skyscraper. Explore, parkour, grapple, zipline, jetpack, steal, have aerial battles, and race around, up and over New York.

Total Freedom
Approach the game and progress in the Battle Pass any way you like. Whether you play solo, co-op or PVP, participate in limited events, social activities or just go nuts in the sandbox – there are tons of opportunities to climb to the head of the heap.

Co-op and Multiplayer Madness
Play with other gangsters in 10-player co-op and PVP events and missions. Work together to leave your mark on the New York underworld and take on the powerful NY Corporate Security forces.

Collect and Customize
Get your hands on a wide variety of cars, trucks, weapons and gadgets. Customize your look and invest your hard-earned in-game rewards on premium items. Complete your Battle Pass to unlock new looks.

data.short_description: Welcome to the Big Apple, a huge free-to-play social sandbox ripe for the taking. Race, shoot, steal, and jetpack your way to the top of the underworld in a near-future New York. Claim the Kingpin title, change the game for everyone and reap the rewards. Your city, your rules.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400, AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 (6GB), AMD Radeon RX 580 (8GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 2700X, Intel Core i7 4790
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT, Nvidia GeForce RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
